level.text: In addition to the uses set forth in §§ 920 through 924 of this Chapter, the following uses shall also be permitted as special exceptions in the W-0 District if appropriate in furthering the objectives of the Waterfront District; Provided that the applicant shall demonstrate that the proposed use meets the special exception criteria set forth in §§ 927 and 3104 of this Title:
Boat launching facility, dock, wharf, or pier except as provided by §901.5 (d);
Cruise line operation, including necessary associated dock and land facilities;
Floating home, only within a permitted marina or yacht club and subject to the provisions of § 922.3;
(dd) Music store, including the sale of musical instruments;
(ff) Off-premises sale of beer and wine, with sale directly to consumers;
(kk) Private club other than a yacht club;
(ll) Public parking – uncovered surface parking lot or underground structure only;
(rr) Swimming pool operated by a local community organization or District government agency;
(ss) Temporary use of premises by fairs, circuses, or carnivals, upon compliance with the provisions of 19 DCMR Chapter 13, “Amusements and Recreation;”
(uu) Water taxi information / ticket booth and passenger shelter; and
(vv) Other maritime-related retail and service commercial uses.
